description: Developed and maintained multiple projects, including a real-time chat application and a CRM system, and implemented RESTful APIs using Node.js, MongoDB, and Redis.

description: Designed and developed backend systems using Golang and Docker, implemented microservices architecture to improve application scalability, and worked closely with product managers and UX designers to ensure optimal user experience and functionality of the software.
